title: Fps drop again.....
body: Why is it every major new patch my fps plummets?  I just got it to stay @ 100 fps after last patch and now it's dropped to 80 and in big team fights in low 20's. Of course none of Rito's suggested fixes aren't worth a damn..

replies.body: A new patch could be a coincidence but there might be bad game files that are not rendering the game properly.  These fps problems could also happen if your drivers are out of date, so I recommend using our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to fix this up.  Hope that helps!
No i have the same problem i did every singe steps from guide that you give (basicly spend my last 2 days trying) and nothing my fps whent down from 70-80 to 15-20-25 ...

Since the guide wasn't able to help, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help.  I also suggest downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some context logs to your ticket. We'll respond back as soon as we can!
